hero.title: Les P'tits Lofts Du Lac
hero.subtitle: Luxury lakeside accommodation with stunning views and exceptional service

paragraphs.1: Welcome to Les P'tits Lofts Du Lac, where luxury meets comfort in the heart of nature. Our boutique accommodation offers stunning lakeside views and personalized service that makes every stay memorable.
paragraphs.2: Each of our carefully designed lofts combines modern amenities with rustic charm, creating the perfect retreat for couples and families alike. Experience the tranquility of lake life while enjoying world-class hospitality.
paragraphs.3: From sunrise coffee on your private balcony to evening dining at our lakeside restaurant, every moment at Les P'tits Lofts is designed to create lasting memories.

sectionRooms.title: Rest, relax, and wake up inspired.

sectionConforts.title: Little details that make your stay better.

testimonials.title: Stories from guests who felt at home.

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.paragraphTwo: Welcome to Molokaih LLC ('Molokaih,' 'we,' 'our,' or 'us'). These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our website ('Website') and services. By accessing or using our Website, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our services.

sectionOne.title: 1. Use of Our Website and Services
sectionOne.text: Molokaih provides digital solutions, including software development, web services, and consulting. You may use our Website and services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
sectionOne.pointOne: Violate any applicable laws or regulations.
sectionOne.pointTwo: Interfere with the proper functioning of our Website.
sectionOne.pointThree: Use the Website for fraudulent or harmful activities.
sectionOne.pointFour: Copy, modify, or distribute content from the Website without authorization.

sectionTwo.title: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
sectionTwo.text: All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property displayed on the Website are the exclusive property of Molokaih or its licensors. You may not use, copy, reproduce, or distribute any content without prior written consent from us.

sectionThree.title: 3. Third-Party Links and Services
sectionThree.text: Our Website may contain links to third-party websites or services for informational purposes. Molokaih is not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of third-party sites. Accessing such sites is at your own risk, and we encourage you to review their terms and privacy policies before engaging with them.

sectionFour.title: 4. Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability
sectionFour.text: Molokaih provides its Website and services 'as is' and 'as available.' We do not guarantee uninterrupted access, accuracy, or error-free performance. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Molokaih disclaims liability for:
sectionFour.pointOne: Any direct, indirect, or incidental damages arising from the use of our Website.
sectionFour.pointTwo: Any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in content.
sectionFour.pointThree: Any unauthorized access to our servers or data.

sectionFive.title: 5. Changes to These Terms
sectionFive.text: We reserve the right to update these Terms at any time. Any modifications will be posted on this page with a revised 'Effective Date.' Continued use of our Website after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

sectionSix.title: 6. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
sectionSix.text: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of Delaware, USA. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be resolved in the courts of Delaware or in the appropriate jurisdiction as required by law.

paragraphThree.text: If you have any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at privacy@molokaih.com.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.paragraphTwo: At Molokaih LLC, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency in how we handle your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and the rights you have concerning your information. Our commitment to privacy is guided by international regulations, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), the Lei Geral de ProteÃ§Ã£o de Dados (LGPD - Brazil), and other global privacy standards.

sectionOne.title: 1. Information We Collect
sectionOne.text: We collect personal data in two main ways: information you provide directly and data collected automatically when you interact with our services. When you fill out forms, subscribe to updates, or engage with us for business inquiries, we may collect details such as your name, email, phone number, and company information. Additionally, when you visit our website, we gather information like your IP address, browser type, device details, and browsing behavior using cookies and similar technologies. These help us enhance user experience, analyze trends, and improve our services.

sectionTwo.title: 2. Purpose and Legal Basis for Processing Your Data
sectionTwo.text: We use your information to deliver services efficiently, communicate updates, offer marketing promotions (where applicable), and ensure a seamless user experience. Your data helps us analyze engagement, maintain security, and comply with regulatory requirements. We do not sell personal data and only share it with third parties when essential for service delivery, such as payment processors or analytics providers. Our legal basis for processing personal data depends on how you engage with us. In many cases, we rely on legitimate interest to improve our services, respond to inquiries, and optimize our platform. For contractual obligations, we process your data when necessary to fulfill services you request. Compliance with legal regulations also requires us to retain certain data, and for activities like marketing or analytics, we obtain your explicit consent when necessary.

sectionThree.title: 3. Data Retention and Security Measures
sectionThree.text: Your data is stored securely, and we only retain it for as long as needed to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Once the retention period expires, we ensure secure deletion or anonymization unless legal obligations require otherwise. Security is a priority at Molokaih. We implement strong encryption, access controls, and regular security audits to safeguard your data from unauthorized access or breaches. If data is transferred across jurisdictions, we ensure compliance with global privacy standards, using Standard Contractual Clauses and Data Processing Agreements with our partners. You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data, restrict processing, or opt out of marketing communications at any time. To exercise these rights, you can contact us at privacy@molokaih.com.

sectionFour.title: 4. Third-Party Links and Policy Updates
sectionFour.text: Our website may contain links to third-party sites, and while we strive to associate only with trusted partners, we encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing personal data. We may update this Privacy Policy periodically, and any significant changes will be communicated through our website. Continued use of our services after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

sectionFive.title: 5. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
sectionFive.text: This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of Delaware, USA, with adherence to applicable international regulations. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Delaware or in the appropriate jurisdiction as required by law.

paragraphThree.text: If you have any questions about our privacy practices or wish to exercise your rights, please reach out to us at privacy@molokaih.com.

CookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
CookiesPolicy.paragraphOne: At Molokaih LLC ('Molokaih,' 'we,' 'our,' or 'us'), we are committed to transparency and protecting your privacy. This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage your preferences. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

sectionOne.title: 1. Why Do We Use Cookies?
points: Ensure the proper functioning of our website.
Improve user experience by remembering preferences.
Analyze website traffic and user behavior.

sectionTwo.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
sectionTwo.text: We use the following types of cookies:

cookieTypes.strictlyNecessary: Strictly Necessary Cookies: Essential for website functionality, allowing you to navigate and use features securely. These cannot be disabled.
cookieTypes.performance: Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site by collecting anonymous data to improve performance.
cookieTypes.functionality: Functionality Cookies: Store user preferences (language, region, display settings) to enhance the browsing experience.
cookieTypes.advertising: Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements based on your browsing habits and preferences.
cookieTypes.analytics: Analytics Cookies: Allow us to analyze traffic and user behavior to optimize website functionality and services.

sectionThree.title: 3. Managing Cookies
sectionThree.text: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:
points: Receive notifications before a cookie is stored.
Adjust preferences for different types of cookies.
sectionThree.note: If you choose to disable cookies, some parts of our website may not function properly.

instructions.chrome: Google Chrome: Manage cookies in Chrome
instructions.firefox: Mozilla Firefox: Manage cookies in Firefox
instructions.edge: Microsoft Edge: Manage cookies in Edge

sectionFour.title: 4. Updates to This Policy
sectionFour.text: We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time to reflect changes in legal requirements or how we use cookies. Any updates will be posted on this page, and your continued use of our website after modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

sectionFive.title: 5. Contact Us
sectionFive.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@molokaih.com.
